T02TD2997E:58b-0: @58b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2997E:58b-1: klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis char 'bebs pa'i las byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bzhengs la /
T02TD2997E:58b-2: klu gnas pa'i sar sbra phub la klu gzugs dang gtor ma rnams bshams la /
T02TD2997E:58b-3: gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod la /
T02TD2997E:58b-4: sgrub pa po bzhi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud stong phrag re klag / gcig gis klu rnams kyi snying po bzla zhing mchod /
T02TD2997E:58b-5: gcig gis gtor ma dang chu gtor gyi las bya'o //
T02TD2997E:58b-6: de ltar bya zhing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab /
T02TD2997E:58b-7: gal te nye bar ma phebs na rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du byas la snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag gsum bzlas te /
T02TD2997E:58b-8: klu shing sna tshogs pa'i me spar te /
T02TD2997E:58b-9: dkar chos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o//
T02TD2997E:59a-0: @59a * // des kyang ma phebs na bdag nyid kyi snying gnas khro chung grangs med pa spros te de dag re re las sprul pa'i khyung grangs med pa spros te /
T02TD2997E:59a-1: klu rnams kyi mgrin pa nas bzung bas klu de dag rab tu skrag pa las /
T02TD2997E:59a-2: rab tu skyugs te char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam du 'bab par dmigs te drag shul gyi sbyin sreg byas pas nges par phebs so //
T02TD2997E:59a-3: klu'i las char dbab pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba /
T02TD2997E:59a-4: dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
